title-group.article-title: Correction: Multi-modal proteomic characterization of lysosomal function and proteostasis in progranulin-deficient neurons

body.p: The original article [1] contained an erroneous duplication of Fig. 1 over Fig. 3 during proofing. The corrected Fig. 3 has since been restored in the original article.

fn.p: The online version of the original article can be found at 10.1186/s13024-023-00673-w.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

ref.mixed-citation: Hasan S, Fernandopulle MS, Humble SW, et al. Multi-modal proteomic characterization of lysosomal function and proteostasis in progranulin-deficient neurons. Mol Neurodegeneration. 2023;18:87. 10.1186/s13024-023-00673-w.
